phrases.text: What value would you like to put into play today?
What is valuable in your life?
What steps would you take right now if you chose to be your best version?
What quality or direction would you like to deliberately cultivate today?
What vital qualities would you like to sustain today?
Right now, are you moving away from discomfort or moving toward what is valuable in your life?
What valuable qualities would you like to embody right now?
